basics.name: Grant Siders
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: Systems engineer specializing in security, virtualization and automation.

highlights: Provide engineering expertise to IP Pathways client base to implement, design and support virtualization, enterprise storage and data center solutions.
Microsoft Windows Server - install, configure and support
VMWare vCenter and ESXi - install, configure and support
Worked on six month consulting project of VMware NSX deployment
Create and maintain highly-detailed infrastructure documentation
Maintain superior levels of communication and customer service for IP Pathways client base.
Microsoft Windows Server - install, configure and support
Hyper-V - install, configure and support
Lead implementation of Carbon Black/Bit9 into corporate and retail environment, working closely with Security Team
Automation with PowerShell
Act as escalation point for Hy-Vee Support Services team
Worked on agile based team
Configuration/Management of Firewalls, IPS, LTM, VPN
Analyzing, troubleshooting and correcting network problems
Maintaining and administering perimeter security systems.
Lead the logistics commitee for the March for Our Lives rally/protest event in Des Moines, IA.
Coordinate and plan the logistics for the day of event, volunteers, exhibitors and speakers.
3-4k people in attendance
Administer and manage Linux webserver
Develop and design team's website using Python Django
Manage and update the team's website
